parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Assigns existing item from inventory (uniform, vest, backpack) to a correct slot. If the slot is occupied by another item, it gets replaced.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''assignItem''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>bluforUnit [[addItem]] "NVGoggles";
bluforUnit [[assignItem]] "NVGoggles";
opforUnit [[addItem]] "NVGoggles_OPFOR";
opforUnit [[assignItem]] "NVGoggles_OPFOR";
independentUnit [[addItem]] "NVGoggles_INDEP";
independentUnit [[assignItem]] "NVGoggles_INDEP";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[unassignItem]], [[addItem]], [[removeItem]], [[linkItem]], [[unlinkItem]], [[assignedItems]], [[removeAllAssignedItems]]
</value></part></template></root>
